pages.text: Integrated Dynamics allows you to create efficient storage networks. Follow this guide to set up a basic storage network with chests and access it through a Storage Terminal.
Craft Cables to connect all components in the network.
Craft Item Interfaces to connect storage containers like chests to the network.
Craft a Storage Terminal to access the network and manage your items.

Setting Up the Network$(br2)1. Place the Chests: Arrange the chests where you want to store your items.$(br2)2. Connect Cables: Run cables from one chest to another, forming a network. Ensure all chests are connected through the cables.

Attaching Item Interfaces$(br2)1. Attach Item Interfaces: Place an Item Interface on each chest you want to connect to the network.$(br2)2. Connect Item Interfaces to Cables: Ensure the Item Interfaces are connected to the network cables, forming a complete network.

Using the Storage Terminal$(br2)1. Place a Storage Terminal: Attach a Storage Terminal to your network cables.$(br2)2. Access the Network: Right-click on the Storage Terminal to open the interface. You can view, insert, and extract items from any connected chest within the network.
